# Negative Infinity

> [Double-precision floating-point][ieee754] negative infinity.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var FLOAT64_NINF = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-ninf' );
```

#### FLOAT64_NINF

[Double-precision floating-point][ieee754] negative infinity.

```javascript
var bool = ( FLOAT64_NINF === -Infinity );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
